title: Ticket #6813: Starter-Side Grid Jobs
description: It would be neat if the starter could launch grid universe jobs. See the design doc. (possible follow-up)
remarks:
2018-Oct-30 14:17:03 by tlmiller:
Regarding [55662]:

  • Jaime notes that the "starter mode" grid manager should skip the whole grid manager ad thing entirely. There are probably other optimizations to be made to this patch.
  • The patch doesn't handle stdin being a sequence of ads, but starter mode should be able to accept its own output as input. This will be convenient for testing as well as recovery (the starter and/or startd don't need to do anything, just pass the file along).
  • Where would otherwise be calling CommitTransaction(), we should instead be calling fflush() or fsync().
